data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Dhar, Madhya Pradesh, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dhar, Madhya Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Dhar, Madhya Pradesh, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 2,185,800 souls living in the county of Dhar with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 24,044 believers in Dhar against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, please remember the Kachhia (Hindu traditions) people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Dhar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Dhar, Madhya Pradesh, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Dhar to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Dhar
location.people_groups_list: Bania Lad, Mochi (Muslim traditions), Nayadi, Prabhu, Bania Khedayata
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bania Lad (131,000), Mochi (Muslim traditions) (66,000), Nayadi (85,000), Prabhu (23,000), Bania Khedayata (64,000)
